item.description:
Join us Monday, Memorial Day evening at 7:00 PM for a free outdoor concert at the Sampas Pavillion in Lowell.

Bring your lawn chairs, snacks & non alcoholic beverages, and enjoy a fun night out watching the concert and socializing while the sun sets on the Merrimack River. Last summer Monday nights were a blast at these concerts! Just a great way to start the week.

Come early at 6:00 PM and see the Classic Cars from days gone by. This show is right in the Heritage Farm parking lot just across the street from the concerts. Or if you prefer, take a mile or two walk before the concert along the beautiful walking path by the river.
It's a wonderful area and a great night out.

Another great lineup of popular local bands is planned for this 2013 season. Each will be posted weekly. See you on the Boulevard!

JACKRABBIT SLIMS

The band's sound is considered a blending of hard rock, R&B and dance party music from the 70s to the 10s.  The two guitar tandem combined with keyboards and vocal harmonies allows JackRabbit Slims to stretch the boundaries of a general business cover band.  If they weren't playing the bar and club circuit they'd become a “Not Your Average” wedding band playing the same diverse set list of music that crowds love to dance to and guys like to listen to while watching the girls dance.

Meet @ the concert park benches just across the street from Heritage Ice Cream & Restaurant around between 6 - 6:30. We'll stake out out turf, post a meetup sign, and take a walk across the street to see the Classic car show and/or get something to eat. My cell #; (603) 759-9876

All-ways a fun time!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet @ the concert park benches just across the street from Heritage Ice Cream & Restaurant. My cell #; (603) 759-9876

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: FREE CONCERT by the River, Starting this season w/ the JACKRABBIT SLIMS Band!
